DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the change in ankle plantar flexion while walking, following treatment with the Ankle Dorsiflexion Dynasplint (AFD) for children diagnosed as Toe Walkers. For twelve weeks, patients will either receive the standard treatment or the same standard treatment and the Dynaslint worn at night.
